roleset.name: have a bad result
roleset.note: BACKFIRE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'backfire' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. (from backfire.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: unaccusative
example.text: Some other fare promotions have backfired.

example.name: with 'benefactive'
example.text: John's plan to make himself irresistable to women backfired on him, when he instead became only irresistable to female cats.
example.arg: John's plan to make himself irresistable to women
when he instead became only irresistable to female cats
